mapper.select: select u.user_id, user_name, full_name, u.description, cast(u.state as char(1)) state, d.value state_name, DATE_FORMAT(entry_date, '%Y-%m-%d') entry_date, c.role_ids, c.role_descriptions from sys_user u left join sys_dictionary d on d.code = u.state and d.enable = 1 and d.type = 'staff_state' left join (select sru.user_id, group_concat(sru.role_id) role_ids, group_concat(sr.description) role_descriptions from sys_role_user sru left join sys_role sr on sru.role_id = sr.role_id group by sru.user_id) c on c.user_id = u.user_id
select sru.user_id, group_concat(sru.role_id), group_concat(sr.description) from sys_role_user sru left join sys_role sr on sru.role_id = sr.role_id group by sru.user_id
